# distance

**Article**

A threshold that measures the user’s proximity to one or more prims.

## Overview

This distance is in stage units (see [https://openusd.org/docs/api/group___usd_geom_linear_units__group.html]) and measures from the center of each prim in [doc://com.apple.usd/documentation/USD/affectedobjects], to the device’s camera.

### Declaration

```other
uniform double distance = 0.0
```

## Properties

- **info:id**: The action’s unique identifier.
- **affectedObjects**: A list of prims that respond to the notification.
